locations.name: Operation Room

items.name: Scalpel
items.description: A small but very sharp scalpel, it could be useful.

items.name: Mirror
items.description: A mirror with a tiny crack in it showing it's hollow on the inside.

description:
You are in a square shaped operation room with nothing arround you except for the bed you woke up on
and a mirror to your left staring straight at you. There are double doors to the north
of you as the only exit from this room.

locations.name: Hallway Middle
description:
You reach a long, horizontal hallway with darkness to the left and right (west and east) of you.
An ominous, mysterious silence fills the hallway as a flickering light above you sets the mood.
You can barely identify a door to your left (west) but it seems to be barricaded.
To your right, you can see another flickering light in the distance.

locations.name: Hallway East 1
description:
You reach another flickering light in the long hallway with two doors on the left leading to the Men's and 
Ladies' bathrooms, and one door on the right with a sign that reads "Janitor's Closet"

locations.name: Mysterious Room
description:
a mysterious room with nothing but darkness in sight, you slowly reach for a light switch
As the light turns on you see what looks like a command room with a large set of monitors.
In the center of the monitors, there is a leather chair with a long back.

The chair turns and you see a tall many sitting on the chair and he looks at you in the eyes
"I am very impressed by your performance, you're the first to complete their trial"

You look at the monitors and notice the monitors have other people in similar operation rooms.

The tall man continues "You've been chosen for a confidential mission to explore the world of Zork,
You have completed your trial.
Congratulation!"

You have completed the MiniZork demo, more is on the way, stay tuned.
